mapper.select: select health_deal.idx, userid, ticket_id, tk_value * 0.75 as tk_value, TRUNC(buyday) as buyDay, TRUNC(expirday) as expirDay ,tkCount from health_deal join health_ticket on health_ticket.idx = health_deal.ticket_id where userid=#{userid} group by health_deal.idx, userid, health_deal.ticket_id,tk_value, TRUNC(buyday), TRUNC(expirday), tkCount
mapper.insert: insert into health_deal (userid, ticket_id, buyDay, expirDay, tkcount values (#{userid}, #{ticket_id}, #{buyDay},'#{expirDay}, (select tk_value from health_ticket where idx = #{idx}) )
mapper.update: update health_deal set tkCount = tkCount - 1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select idx from (select * from health_deal where userid= #{userid} order by tkCount, buyDay) where rownum =1

SELECT SUM(tkcount) AS tkcount, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_1, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_2, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_3, imp_uid, buyday, tkbuycount FROM health_deal where userid = #{userid} GROUP BY imp_uid, buyday, tkbuycount HAVING SUM(tkcount) = tkbuycount

SELECT userid, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_1, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_2, SUM(CASE WHEN ticket_id = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ticket_3, buyday FROM health_deal GROUP BY userid, buyday
